mainText:
Promo: "Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your sense of entitlement meets its match!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: ---I once demanded a first-class upgrade on a flight because they didn't have my favorite brand of bottled water. When the flight attendant politely explained they didn't carry that specific brand, I threw an epic tantrum, claiming they were personally attacking my hydration preferences. I insisted on speaking to the captain, who, upon hearing my tale of woe, promptly upgraded me to a private jet, complete with a personal water sommelier. My entitlement validated, I sipped my imported artisanal water triumphantly, knowing that sometimes, justice tastes best with a hint of entitlement.
